content.question: <math alttext="the derivative, with respect to x, of, open parenthesis, the inverse cosecant of, open parenthesis, e to the x power, close parenthesis, close parenthesis, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>csc</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="negative e to the x power, times the cotangent of, open parenthesis, e to the x power, close parenthesis, times the cosecant of, open parenthesis, e to the x power, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>⋅</mo><mi>cot</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo><mo>⋅</mo><mi>csc</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="e to the x power, times the cotangent of, open parenthesis, e to the x power, close parenthesis, times the cosecant cubed of, open parenthesis, e to the x power, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>⋅</mo><mi>cot</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo><mo>⋅</mo><msup><mrow><mi>csc</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator e to the x power, and denominator the square root of 1 minus, e raised to the 2 x power, end root, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator negative 1, and denominator e to the x power, times, the square root of 1 minus, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator e raised to the 2 x power, end fraction, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator negative 1, and denominator e to the x power, times, the square root of 1 minus, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator e raised to the 2 x power, end fraction, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><msqrt><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>
